official_title: Point of Care Ultraviolet Microscopy as a Novel Screening Method for Cervical Dysplasia
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients presenting for cervical cancer screening.
* Patients presenting for follow-up for positive cervical cancer screening.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients who do not, or no longer, require cervical cancer screening
